long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Auto connect & auto send fully-customized message to everyone in your current Linkedin search, every tasks running in the browser under your watch.
From a search page, magically export all data (name, city, job, current company, phone, email adress, opentowork & hiring status) to an excel file.
Export all the open-to-work people directly from your network page with the following data (name, city, job, current company, phone, email adress, opentowork & hiring status)
The extension will browse automatically to the last page of results or until the weekly limit is reached !
Remove automatically as much sent invitation as you want.
This extension also let you change the background color & remove all adds.
